- Percent-level effect
- Polluted by shape noise
- Requires a large number of galaxies

## The landscape of lensing surveys

![](images/landscape_lensing.png){.absolute right=-200 bottom=100 height=500}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
Technical specifications of UNIONS:

- Target area: $~ 5,000$ deg$^2$
- Depth: 24.5 ($r$-band)
- Seeing: $~0.69"$ ($r$-band)
- Processing with \texttt{ShapePipe} ([Farrens et al., 2022](https://arxiv.org/abs/2206.14689))
- $~100$ million galaxies
:::
